sourcesContent:
const Price = (props) => { const { price, percent_change_1h, percent_change_7d, percent_change_24h, volume_24h, market_cap } = props.bitcoin; return (
Precio del Bitcoin

Precio Actual del Bitcoin: $ {price.toFixed(2)} USD

Ultima Hora: {percent_change_1h}

Ultimas 24h: {percent_change_24h}

Ultimos 7d: {percent_change_7d}

) } export default Price;
